message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100? I'm really interested in this product and I think it's a fair price for both of us.

I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $105. It's the lowest price I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $105, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
